name: Suomen  Metsästäjäliitto Finlands Jägarförbund
memberOrga: 16 autonomic districts, 2700 hunting associations. Some private persons have several memberships which means the number above is slightly higher than the headcount.
goal: Maintain original Finnish hunting culture and ensure hunting facilities when it comes to nature and legislation.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety
euInitiatives: Big carnivors program, Lead in bullets and pellets, environmental issues like fitness check of nature directives.
